question: Analyze the social media engagement trends of companies within the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies that belong to the technology industry from the CompanyInfo table.
Gather social media engagement metrics for the identified technology companies from the SocialMediaInfo table.
Analyze the engagement metrics from the Facebook and Instagram sections (CompanyFacebookDetail and CompanyInstagramDetail) to determine which platforms have the highest engagement.
Compile the social media data to observe trends over time by checking the created dates in the social media detail tables (e.g., CompanyFacebookDetail and CompanyInstagramDetail).
Visualize the engagement trends to present findings on the social media strategies of technology companies.
